select * from allcoupon where companyid = (select companyid from member_detail where id=#{id})

SELECT ap.* FROM all_product ap JOIN ( SELECT companyid, category, category2, flavor, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM buyproduct WHERE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(setdate, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYY-MM') GROUP BY companyid, category, category2, flavor ) bp ON ap.companyid = bp.companyid AND ap.category = bp.category AND ap.category2 = bp.category2 AND ap.flavor = bp.flavor ORDER BY bp.total_amount DESC

SELECT ap.* FROM all_product ap JOIN ( SELECT companyid, category, category2, flavor, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM buyproduct WHERE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(setdate, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - INTERVAL '7' DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY companyid, category, category2, flavor ) bp ON ap.companyid = bp.companyid AND ap.category = bp.category AND ap.category2 = bp.category2 AND ap.flavor = bp.flavor ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM all_productimg WHERE companyid=#{companyid} and category=#{category} and category2=#{category2} and thum=1 ORDER BY NUM ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT all_product.* FROM all_product JOIN discount ON all_product.num = discount.num WHERE TRUNC(sysdate) BETWEEN discount.startr AND discount.endr ORDER BY discount.sale DESC
select sale from discount where num=#{num}
SELECT * FROM all_product WHERE expiry BETWEEN SYSDATE AND ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, 2) order by expiry asc
select * from productinfo WHERE SUBSTR(productid, 3, 2) IN ('11', '12', '13', '14', '15')
select * from productinfo WHERE SUBSTR(productid, 3, 2) IN ('21', '22', '23', '24', '25', '26')

SELECT ap.product, ap.price, api.*, pi.* FROM all_product ap JOIN all_productimg api ON ap.companyid = api.companyid AND ap.category = api.category AND ap.category2 = api.category2 AND ap.flavor = api.flavor JOIN productinfo pi ON api.companyid || api.category || api.category2 || api.flavor = pi.productid WHERE ap.companyid || ap.category || ap.category2 || ap.flavor = #{productid} and api.thum = 1 ORDER BY api.num ASC
